alert.note: Alert for Orange County Coastal; Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys; Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 11 at 3:46AM PST until December 11 at 6:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds becoming west 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 35 mph. Brief gusts of 45 mph possible near the time of frontal passage today. * WHERE...San Diego County Coastal Areas, San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire, San Diego County Valleys, Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills, Apple and Lucerne Valleys, Coachella Valley, San Diego County Deserts, San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning, Orange County Coastal Areas and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 6 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs and palm fronds could break and fall, creating a hazard. Weak or shallow rooted trees could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
